medicine.name: Advil
medicine.indications: For relief of minor aches, pain, and fever.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if pain or fever worsens or lasts more than 3 days
Do not use if allergic to ibuprofen or other NSAIDs
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Albuterol
medicine.indications: For treatment of asthma and other respiratory conditions.
warnings: Do not use more than directed
May cause tremors, nervousness, or headache
Consult a doctor if symptoms do not improve
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Amoksil
medicine.indications: For treatment of bacterial infections.
warnings: Take with food to reduce stomach upset
Consult a doctor if symptoms persist or worsen
Do not use if allergic to amoxicillin or other penicillin antibiotics
Keep out of reach of children
medicine.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

medicine.name: Aspirin
medicine.indications: For relief of minor aches and pains, fever, and inflammation.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Do not use if you have a stomach ulcer
Do not use if allergic to aspirin
Consult a doctor if you have asthma or are taking blood thinners
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Betaloc
medicine.indications: For treatment of high blood pressure, angina, and heart rhythm disorders.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you have heart problems or asthma
May cause dizziness or fatigue
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Cipralex
medicine.indications: For treatment of depression and generalized anxiety disorder.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you experience worsening depression, suicidal thoughts, or unusual changes in behavior
May cause drowsiness or dizziness
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Cipram
medicine.indications: For treatment of depression and panic disorder.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you experience worsening depression, suicidal thoughts, or unusual changes in behavior
May cause drowsiness or dizziness
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Espumisan
medicine.indications: For relief of symptoms associated with gas in the gastrointestinal tract.
warnings: Do not exceed the recommended dose
Consult a doctor if symptoms persist or worsen
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Euthyrox
medicine.indications: For treatment of hypothyroidism.
warnings: Take on an empty stomach, at least 30 minutes before breakfast
Consult a doctor if symptoms persist or worsen
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Glucophage
medicine.indications: For treatment of type 2 diabetes.
warnings: Take with meals to reduce stomach upset
Consult a doctor if you have kidney or liver disease
May cause lactic acidosis in rare cases
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Lipitor
medicine.indications: For treatment of high cholesterol and prevention of cardiovascular diseases.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you have liver disease or unexplained muscle pain
May cause liver damage and muscle breakdown
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Losec
medicine.indications: For treatment of acid-related disorders, including gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) and stomach ulcers.
warnings: Do not exceed the recommended dose or duration of treatment
Consult a doctor if symptoms persist or worsen
May increase the risk of certain infections
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Metoprol
medicine.indications: For treatment of high blood pressure, angina, and heart rhythm disorders.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you have heart problems or asthma
May cause dizziness or fatigue
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Norvasc
medicine.indications: For treatment of high blood pressure and chest pain (angina).
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you have liver disease or low blood pressure
May cause dizziness or flushing
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Novalgin
medicine.indications: For treatment of moderate to severe pain and fever when oral administration is not possible.
warnings: Administer under the supervision of a healthcare professional
May cause severe allergic reactions
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Paracetamol
medicine.indications: For relief of mild to moderate pain, including headache, toothache, menstrual cramps, muscle pain, and fever.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you have liver disease
Consult a doctor if you are pregnant or breastfeeding
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Seropram
medicine.indications: For treatment of depression and panic disorder.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you experience worsening depression, suicidal thoughts, or unusual changes in behavior
May cause drowsiness or dizziness
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Simvastatin
medicine.indications: For treatment of high cholesterol.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you have liver disease or are pregnant or breastfeeding
May cause muscle damage
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Xanax
medicine.indications: For treatment of anxiety and panic disorders.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
May cause drowsiness or dizziness
Consult a doctor if you have liver or kidney disease, glaucoma, or a history of drug or alcohol abuse
Do not use if pregnant or breastfeeding
Keep out of reach of children

medicine.name: Zoloft
medicine.indications: For treatment of depression, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), panic disorder, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), and social anxiety disorder.
warnings: Do not take more than directed
Consult a doctor if you experience worsening depression, suicidal thoughts, or unusual changes in behavior
May cause drowsiness or dizziness
Keep out of reach of children
